title: Las Vegas tourism leaders urge patience as headwinds linger - Las Vegas Sun News
description: A 7.5% dip in visitation last year raised concerns that Las Vegas was losing its luster, but Boyd Gaming CEO Keith Smith contends it’s “nothing we haven’t seen before.”
